Question: Raptor CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Ford

F-150 Raptor

 - Longitudinally mounted front-engine
 - 10-speed automatic transmission
 - 2-speed torque on-demand 4x4 with mechanical lock
 - Electronic locking rear differential with 4.10 axle

Razer

Blade 16

 - 14th Gen Intel Core i9-14900HX processor
 - GeForce RTX 4090 GPU
 - Targeted for high-performance gaming
